note:
She/her/they. I currently teach at a small private school. Previously, I've worked in marketing, website/web app design, editing, and more underpayed retail jobs than I can recall.

Many years ago I acquired a B.A. in English literature with a minor in European history. If I had more years to spend (and maybe I do), I'd focus on linguistics and history. Lots of history.

I'm fascinated by teaching, poetry, linguistics, history, crafts, veering humor, cats, and more.
